**Exceptional performance operating out of grade**-Erin was pulled out as Gr2 on my flight DXB-ISB-DXB. From the beginning of the briefing, she showed a very positive attitude about operating out of grade-Erin displayed a great knowledge of Economy service, setting up the carts correctly by herself without help of the quick reference guides. She was aware of the security areas for her checks and all the aspects related of her role as Gr.2.-Erin was L5A position, from the beginning of the flight she was my biggest support on the flight, she prepared all the steps for the service without being asked and without miss any step or made any shortfall. During service, she acted as galley operator in L5 galley while I was dealing with some costumers incidents on the cabin. Despite of that, she still carried out the service on the cabin getting 2 meal carts and 2 clearance carts.-She was always taking initiative for the galley and service duties, I didn't have to ask her to do anything since she was always volunteering before I request a crew to perform the duty. Including attending the call bells after the service. -I was trully impressed with Erin, her exceptional performance and positive attitude towards job was exceptional. Specially when she was pulled out to operate out of grade.-She is truly one of our best assest. Wishing all the best for her career in Emirates.

**Exceptional crew performance ****The following were observed on crew member Nicolaos' performance.*Positive approachable attitude displayed from the start of the journey at the briefing and throughout the flight.*Excellent attention to detail, with service steps, food and bev presentation.*Was attentive to call customers, using customer names, conversing with customers and taking initiatives to assist.*Showed respect and consideration towards colleagues, was observed in assisting in all areas of the cabin, once his allocated tasks were completed.*When the galley operator Wasson break, he took over the galley, and left it in an immaculate organised state..*It was Nicolaos' birthday when he came into the flight, however, he made the flight all about his customers and colleagues, with his positive and hardworking  attitude.*His attention to detail and efficient positive personality that contributed to a successful flight, was also observed by the Purser.*I wish Nicholaos the best on his future endeavours.

**excellent performance**Lindy is a hardworking crew member. Throughout her flight she has been incredibly considered and polite to her fellow colleagues and to customers. She maintained a positive attitude, smile and professionalism, including her image and uniform standardsCustomers on row 46D and row 54D/E complimented Lindy on her friendliness and approachability. It was a pleasure flying with Lindy.

**Excellent Performance**I wanted to share my observation of Miranda Stiles during the EK 075 flight on 03/01/2018.Miranda displayed confidence and proficient knowledge during the briefing by engaging in pre-flight discussion. Her overall appearance exudes professionalism.During boarding, Miranda assisted at ML2 by greeting customers in their native language. She took initiative to learn "Happy New Year" in French as a way to welcome passengers on board.I observed Miranda positively engaging with customers, especially mothers with infants. She made sure to inform families of the available necessities on board such as baby food, bottles, diapers, etc. During the service, Miranda stated the accurate description of the meal choices as well as offering by name the available wine selection. I was thoroughly impressed with her knowledge, teamwork, efficiency during the service, and customer engagement. I can assure you, she is a cabin crew to be acknowledged.

**Excellent Performance**-Angie performed extremely well on both flights to and from San Francisco. No sooner she boarded the aircraft Angie and her colleague Daniel ensured that all that was needed for the service was prepared and kept ready.-She was quick to serve the cockpit. I did not have to tell her anything, she used her own initiative, experience and knowledge, and in compliance with EK standards, she ensured all aspects of the serve was covered.-On the way back to Dubai, she handled a medical incident, where a lady almost fainted due to hyperglycaemia... and until the other CSV got there she administered necessary first aid.-She handled the situation with such confidence that m the customers looking on, commended on the way she handled it.-Angie is so proactive in her work. Her excellent teamwork skills and customer interactions make her a very good crew. She is an asset to Emirates. Shows a lot of potential in being a leader, and if given the chance I am very certain that she would perform well.

**Excellent performance**- Leaving from Dubai with one crew minus can be challenging for whole team if the operating flight is almost full and the destination is known for honeymooners and customers that enjoy our products and services on board; Hesham volunteered to cover the checks for the MR5 door and also to help during both services- I also observed him sitting down and helping one of the DF operators with the sales, after the service finished, he actually refused to return to his cabin until everything has been covered - It is important to feel that you have crew to rely on when in need, Hesham has multitasking skills and the spirit of a leader, participating in every stage of the flight with what he can do in order to make the customers benefit from the best in flight experience on board- When I approached Hesham and I thanked him for his help and consideration towards his colleagues, I told him that I think he will become a great leader; he informed me he is actually waiting for his cabin supervisor training- I was happy to hear that and I do believe in his abilities and dedication on board; I am sure he will perform as good as today in his future role; please acknowledge Hesham for his excellent performance with my kind regards

**EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE**- Karandip was very proactive starting from the briefing room - He has this genuine positivity which reflected on all his colleagues - He was always making jokes and laughing with them - He was seen taking initiative in doing the we care even though it was not his turn to do so - He would inform me whenever a task were completed - Very attentionate to details and friendly with his customers - On the return sector, he was actively participating in the briefing sharing his safety knowledge with his fellow colleagues - Noticed that his fellow colleague Caroline was doing the galley for the first, he was always assisting her and guiding her.

**Excellent customer service of Amalina**-Amalina has showed an amazing performance during our multi sector flight.-She would constantly check all the lavatories, be present in the cabin and ask passengers if they would like to drink anything.-Amalina also made sure she would follow up with the we care schedule and even when she was visiting other cabins she would inform me that she will be back before her we care schedule begin.-All 4 sectors we had i have received good feedback from the customers that Amalina was serving.-She was very kind towards her colleagues and to her customers.

**Excellent Crew Performance**-I had the pleasure of flying with Daniel going to San Francisco and coming back on both sectors his work was impeccable.From his first interaction with his team ex DXB at briefing, where he parted his knowledge on his previous experience on San Francisco flights and advising the crew on how to improve the service, until we got back to Dubai, he remained, enthusiastic, friendly and approachable to all crew of all grades.-He showed so much confidence in his work and the way he carried himself. Daniel was so organised that I did not have to tell him anything. No sooner he boarded the aircraft, he ensured all service items were prepared well ahead of time and was ready when needed. The juices order forms were filled in where appropriate for when we would require it at the end of the flight. Galley was always staples, and the teamwork and hard work was beyond measure.-His interactions with his customers were the same as his crew, no matter how taxing the flight became, Daniel never lost his smile or calm. He was always going above and beyond.-He was able to mange the galley by himself whilst I was on break without being promoted,. -Daniels confidence in handling customers who wanted vegetarian meals, or customers that wanted there IFE rested or had questions about on board WiFi and products was handled with easy.-He truly shows potential in becoming a leader and if given the opportunity he would be an even more valuable asset to Emirates.

**Crew meals re not enough**-Crew meals were not enough for the crew.-Crew meals loaded were 4 hot meals, sandwiches, fruits and yogurts for 8 crew.-crew are eligible for lunch and dinner as flight departure is 13:35 (crew left their houses at 11) and landed 22:20 (crew arrived to HQ at 23:00)-All crew required 2 hot meals each (one each sector), as sandwiches or fruits cannot substitute lunch or dinner, as well crew require energy for 2 full load sectors.

***Validating F Class Customer Experience ***- Personally Welcomed Shka Alkhalifa.- I had a small conversation with customer as I welcomed and introduced myself in Arabic, which customer was pleasantly surprised with. - Shka Alkhalifa was menu by myself, explaining the service.- Customer mentioned she had enjoyed her meals.- During the conversations there were no concerns highlighted to myself.-  Upon top of decent, I followed up with Shka Alkhalifa to see how her flight was and she mentioned she had enjoyed her flight.

***Validating F Class Customer Experience ***- All customers were welcomed by myself.- I had a conversation with all customers who wished to engage in conversation.- All customers were given a menu by, explaining the service.- Customers mentioned they had enjoyed their meals.- During the conversations there were no concerns highlighted to myself.-  Upon top of decent, I followed up with customers to see how their flight was and all mentioned they had enjoyed their flight.

***Utmost professionalism and team spirit, with prolonged delay on ground; DXB- AKL***-Just prior to boarding customers, the Captain informed of a technical issue, that may or may not be resolved. -STD was 10:05 and we remained on the aircraft till 12:45, until the decision was reached that we needed an aircraft change. -Being the longest ULR in our network, and then having a 4 hours delay on top of that, we were very close to running out of hours. -During this time the communication to the flight deck was that we would be short of crew to have a whole replacement to take over from us. -By the time we changed aircraft, the cleaning and catering were still underway, so the crews' prioritisation and proactivity was a must, in order for us to be legal for the flight. -Both the ground staff and dispatcher gave did not have hope in the flight leaving before our cut off time and stated that they 'could never forget this team.'

***Outstanding performance***-Crew member Natsuki was observed by her CSV and myself delivering an outstanding service in the cabin. -Natsuki have the right attitude and understanding of service needs and deliver it with passion. -She is respectful, approachable, always have a smile, and is helpful with both crew members and customers. -She is able to complete any task assigned to her without any shortcuts. -She knows when and how to choose her customers when assistance is required and she gladly offer help. -She was understanding of all the business and service needs and volunteered to assist in JC after completing all her assigned tasks in YC. -She have received several positive feedback from crew and customers. -She have a wide knowledge of the service delivery standards and products.

***outstanding performance***- Cabin crew Inette was very proactive during the whole flight, she was very organised and was always one step ahead of the service.- She was observed preparing special meals stickers and organizing spml trails to ensure quick delivery.- She was observed labelling rear galley container to help her colleagues finding them easily.- She was prompt to answer call bells and was observed double handing cart once finish with her own duty.- She prepared and organised hot beverage in advance to ensure smooth flow of the service.- Out of Jeddah she was observed helping in the cabin during boarding assisting customer with seating problem and luggage, managing space in Hat racks.- She was overall very friendly and contribute to create a positive working environment during a challenging flight

***Outstanding performance displayed by CSV Moustafa***-It is with pleasure I would like to bring to the company's attention that the outstanding performance displayed by CSV Moustafa on this flight.-I am certain that he always receives good feedback, however I still would like to write this VR because I will feel guilty if I did not do so.-The details of his performance has been captured on MFP, please kindly refer to the documents.

***Order VLML***Customer claimed she had booked VLML through travel agency however no such info seems available under customer profile.Ordered via CMT for connecting flight to JFK advising customer due to time available to pick up suitable foods in DXB to minimise impact for her flight, customer thankful for all help given.

***Orange juice shortage***- Orange juice all used in breakfast service (first service)- Nothing left for other 2 services - In back economy galley one half cart was loaded with minerals- not used/needed, one half cart with juices (with only 6 orange juices all used)- other juices not used at all- Pls load 2 half carts of ONLY orange juice on sectors DXB-GRU-DXB

***Operating as CSV***- This flight was missing a cabin supervisor - Naja was very motivated to operate as Cabin Supervisor and volunteered to do so - Due to her motivation she operated both sectors as CSV

***Operating as a grade 1***-Leona was asked to operate as a grade one as we reached the aircraft at the last minuet .-She was extremely positive and excited to take on the challenge and appeared confident .-She claimed she had been reading about the J class service in her free time at home and really was looking forward to working on her learning today I was very impressed with her dedication to her role in her job .-She asked a lot of questions to make sure that her job was done correctly and claimed that she could not wait to be working in J class full time .-She made sure her wine knowledge and pronunciation was correct before she went into the cabin .-Her seat introduction was very professional and she was very professional whilst introducing the customers .-After she had finished the service she volunteered to go and help Y class out with there special meals and clearance she could not do enough to help her team members out .-She communicated clearly to the team and myself at all times seeking clarifications and advice , also making the team aware of anything happening in the cabin that needed to be shared .

***Inspiring Leader**** Dear Nuru, I must take the time to inform you how impressed I was with Moustafa's performance* From the moment I sent my pre-flight email, I've got a reply from Moustafa thanking me for the information shared in my email and how much he was looking forward to the trip * Moustafa was the first one in the briefing room, was fully prepared about the trip and ready to brief me on any specials about his cabin * During the Customer cabin preview, Moustafa provided clear expectation maintaining his positivity and  focusing in the customer experience, he also mention to the crew member selected for flight performance that this was their time to shine * Once on board, Moustafa communicated with ground staff and the flight deck, keeping me informed at all times * During the flight Moustafa maintained a professional and enthusiastic approach* Moustafa was observed double ending meal carts and doing Tea and coffee by had, when I asked him why he does this, he stated that this is the best way to keep on eye on the customer's experience and monitoring his cabin * Moustafa printed out the SPML to his colleague working at ML5 * Mostafa was generally observed caring about his customer and his team

***High performance crew***- Sushanth is a highly pro active team member, always available in the cabin, great team player and professional at all times.- During our 14 hours flight I observed Sushanth taking the lead and guiding his colleagues as well as taking care of the galley when I had to deal with customers who requested my presence or while I was n break.- While in the cabin Sushanth connected with customers and one of them approached me and highlighted how friendly and caring he is.

***HIGH PERFORMANCE CREW MESUT KOC 446976***- I'm writing this report in recognition of Mesut's outstanding performance on our flight to and from Zürich. I've flown with Mesut previously but didn't have the opportunity to work with him on that occasion, even then he managed to impress me with his warm genuine approach to customers during disembarkation.- Mesut truly cares about the customers he looks after, he makes the effort to get to know them and follows up on them throughout the flight. We had one couple in particular who were on honeymoon, he carries a blackboard and chalk in his bag and writes on it; the flight number, name of the couple and the occasion for them to take a photo with, they were delighted.- In the galley Mesut is a joy to work with, organising everything ahead of time, he inspires his colleagues to do the same and motivates all those who work with him.- Mesut also brings his magic tricks onboard, he can do fantastic card tricks and was entertaining Gold Skywards customers as well as many others on both sectors.- On our return sector Mesut went to assist JC as the cabin was full upstairs.- I honestly wish I had a crew like Mesut on every flight, I see crew morale is very low at the moment for various reasons and people like Mesut are just the tonic to lift the mood and create a happy working atmosphere.

(from both customers and colleagues' feedbacks)

( when walking down through YC ,she noted down some request/orders from different customers and passed them immediately to crew or CSVs, which reflected her wide vision of team work.)-There was a situation that 10 trays+hot casseroles needed to be transferred from FWD to AFT YC galley, Jheremia actively assisted crew with transferring when she was on the way back to the upper deck after her rotation in YC.-Jheremia was professional, friendly, smiley and helpful, which contributed on enhancing flying experience to both customers and colleagues.-Her positive energy spread across all cabins.

***Excellent Performance***-Sameh was observed being proactive all through out the flight by being in the cabin and offering help to his colleagues whenever possible even though he's the galley operator.-Sameh was seen taking his time to be in cabin and interact with customers during and after the service.-As we are delayed for 01 and half hour, Sameh managed the galley properly and on time ready for service without any delay. Excellent galley management.-Sameh's fellow GR1's and CSV Nikki also commended him for being helpful, friendly and positive on both sectors.

***Excellent performance***- Mei is passionate and hardworking crew- I observed her helping her colleagues without being asked, she notice what needs to be done and just jumps in and do it, she has patience and works in very calm manner - Mei is always smiling and approachable towards her customers, always available in the cabin - She notices details, she has quick response to any requests, very efficient when working- Kei is aware of all recent updates and standards, very good memory- Mei was very proactive and organized at all times, being a brilliant example to her colleagues

***Excellent Performance Achieved*** - I felt it necessary to highlight a little appreciation to Mr Clayton for his excellent customer service as well as his professionalism .-High value customer Mrs Jokonya seated in 7J provided me with some great positive feedback regarding Mr Claytons enthusiasm and attention to detail regarding the way he works.-His customers were " wowed" by his performance and he certainly brought his colours to the emirates tribe  by chatting with his customers and providing them travel information and must go to tourist information for their exciting adventures ahead with Emirates.- From briefing Mr Clayton arrived early , coming prepared with all the updates written down to update the crew that were not aware. -A huge thank you To Mr Clayton for his dedication to his customers must be said.-It is flying with Emirates cabin crew such as himself the reason our customers enjoy to travel with us . Mr Clayton adds  a personal style and finesse to his service , providing the worlds best inflight experience for our teams as well as our customers.

***Excellent listening skills, avoided delay***-During boarding, customer in 80H was shivering, crying and had vomited once.-Crew informed me of what happened. When I got there, CSV Gozde Cetindag s422332 was already speaking to the customer.-She had already taken a SAMPLE and had found out that the girl was 24 years old and suffering from a severe fear of flying. -Gozde also found out that her parents are traveling on the plane but are seated separately. She spoke to them other and found out that this is something that always happens to the customer when boarding any plane.-I have noticed Gozde empathising with the girl and trying to make her feel comfortable by mentioning that she also has a sister her age. -After asking my opinion after I witnessed the conversation, and the Purser's opinion, and after speaking to the Captain, we have made the decision that this was not to be treated as a medical case, but just as an intense fear of flying.-This whole conversation that Gozde had with the customer, saved us from a delay which implied offloading luggage and trying to make the family understand what is happening.-Gozde offered the customer a window seat, as she was not fit to sit by the emergency exit row, and checked on her throughout the flight to make sure she is fine.-I believe this CSV did a great job by just listening to the customer situation and understanding what is actually happening and saved us from a delay situation.

***compliment from cabin supervisor***Having Mustafa as a team member was just amazing on a busy flight like San Francisco. He prepared all service items without being asked and helped everywhere he could during the flight. Everybody was tired because of a busy flight but Mustafa kept his colleagues motivated by assisting them whenever possible. I had to deal with a medical case few minutes after the service start and Mustafa took over the galley and prepared the rest of the carts for the service. I am really looking forward to working with him again and wish him all the best.

This is one of the best flight I have ever had.. we are welcomed from the announcement right after boarding and each crew member treat us so nice.. they all smiley, happy and helpful all the time. We really feel special and comfortable on this flight.."-Mr. Tan claimed that all his travelling experience with Emirates were great in general and he would like to keep on travelling with his group on Emirates flight.-Mr. Tan and his group disembarked satisfied and grateful.

****Crew Compliments***** It was of great pleasure to fly with a competent and highly reliable senior such as Sunita Onnya.* Observed Competencies:   1. LEADING THE TEAM / TEAMWORK - Sunita happily took charge of planning and conspiring with our team on surprising a lady when her partner proposed on board. Sunita assigned various crew, different tasks ( decorating the lounge / taking photos and videos / escorting the couple to the scene / deciding the appropriate time to do the surprise without affecting other customers' experience and service flow ).   2. CUSTOMER SERVICE - Sunita, together with the rest of our team, made the newly-engaged couple's in-flight experience awesome and unforgettable.She used her own personal resources ( greeting card / balloons ) on setting up the lounge to surprise the couple.   3. PROFESSIONAL BEHAVIOUR - I received a couple of praises about Sunita's kind and thoughtful attitude towards her colleagues. I personally observed how kind-mannered she is but at the same time, thorough with her duties as a leader on board.She boosted one of the CSV's morale and confidence by giving comforting words and listening intently to the other CSVs predicament.

****** Great performance ******* -I would like to praise crew Oksana for her great performance during that multi sector flight.-Oksana has a positive attitude, always smiling, willing to her colleagues all the time even without been asked.-After the service, she took the initiative to attend the call bell, she is very active crew, hard working.-I like how she interact with our customers, specially during the service, she was asking them about their meal & their trip, very friendly person.-All the best for her future career & looking forward to operate with oksana. -Oksana was helping a Russian family with a medical case, their child had a high fever, she took sample, play a good role for translation & reassure the family & over toys to the child.-She was checking on the Russian family regularly, which make them feel more comfortable.-During disembarkation, the Russian family approached Oksana & thanks her for taking well care of them & specially the child.

**** APPRECIATION  ****- Please note that GR2 crew member Axel Combes, s444332, displayed high level of professionalism while on duty, on both sectors- He was observed being enthusiastic, self motivated and energetic, completing all duties without being asked. - He worked in organized and calm manner, contributing to nice atmosphere in Y/C- He was observed sharing the work load and offering help to all crew members, irrespective of their position- He displayed full awareness of customer profile in his area and informed me about a lady who did not appear well, during boarding- He also assisted with a medical case, when a customer felt nausea, by applying correct procedure and comforting the customer- He communicated in an open, clear and informative manner, keeping me updated about everything - He was observed displaying genuine care of customers wellbeing by regularly checking on two pregnant ladies and a sick customer, although they were seated in two different cabins- He was observed being caring towards his colleagues and went to search for a desert, that his colleague mentioned that she would like to try- Assisted me with post landing duties, after completing his area- He was easily guided and accepted feedback given by PUR about more efficient ways to secure cabin - He also asked for feedback and ways to improve performance

She was seen prioritising customer satisfaction and responding to complaints/problems promptly and suitably.  - Noura identified and dealt with a medical issue in her cabin. After the first sector she cleared the ovens and put all the remaining meals in one place, she loaded the meals for the next sector and replenished bars. - When I cut my finger she quickly helped me with a band aid and tissues. - She was promptly attending call bells and delivering customers requests.- She never complained about how many carts she had to take, or that she had to do tea and coffee on one side, always one step forward. Responsive, helpful, kind and friendly, a real team player.- She made my flight as a CSV, a better one.

*** Food in J/C being wasted during this sector ***- Most f the J/C customers have dinner at the Emirates lounge before the flight, therefore they refuse to have dinner on board, as they prefer to sleep, as it is a night flight;- This results in a lot of waste of food, mainly appetisers, hot meals and desserts.

*** Fantastic leadership skills cc Rana Abu Eitah s389853 ***- During flight I worked in economy class and I could observe closely some leadership skills displayed by cc Rana Eitah s389853.- Rana had everything organized in her galley. She made notes in the galley displaying the locations fr used and unused juices.- Galley was shining during flight.- During service Rana instructed her galley operator in the middle galley to use the thermometer and check the meal option.- Rana ensured that her team was divided in both sides of the cabin so all customers in both sides could get their meals at the same time.- Rana during the service ensured her team was checking toilets.- Rana during service always brought to cabin crew attention call bells. *** F Class Customer Experience ***- Customers were welcomed by myself.- I had a small conversation with all customers.- All customers were given a J Class menu, they were advised from EK ground staff due to last minute upgrade and no catering in F Class that they would be served J Class meals, they accepted. - Customers mentioned they had enjoyed their meal.- During the conversations there were no concerns highlighted to myself regarding the service.-  Upon top of decent, I followed up with customers to see how their flight was and all mentioned they had enjoyed their flight.

*** F Class Customer Experience ***- All customers were welcomed by myself.- I had a small conversation with all customers regarding their trip.- All customers were given a J Class menu, they were advised from EK ground staff due to last minute upgrade and no catering in F Class that they would be served J Class meals, they accepted. - Customers mentioned they had enjoyed their meal.- During the conversations there were no concerns highlighted to myself.-  Upon top of decent, I followed up with customers to see how their flight was and all mentioned they had enjoyed their flight.

*** Expired items loaded ***- All packs with ''Mini Favourites''- Salted Caramel Popcorn by Cobs have the expiry date : 09 Jan 2018.- The items were loaded to be displayed in the JC social area baskets.

*** EXEMPLARY PERFORMANCE ***- Georgia was observed to have exemplary performance on both sectors of this trip. She is a very energetic crew and so passionate about her job. Following are the examples she did:- 1. On the first sector, Customer was not feeling well, Georgia took care of the customer, reassured and took the sample. Informed CSV. Same thing happened on the return sector- 2. On the return sector (boarding), 82AB, 83A had water leaking from ceiling due to condensation from AC, Georgia informed seniors at this time as customers were not happy. Purser called for engineer, however Georgia did not delay, looked for the seat covers and changed the seat covers of those 3 seats herself. She did this to avoid further delay. Also, after take off and during the flight, Georgia came back to those 3 customers and made sure they were okay. She highlighted that if it continues she can change the seats for them- 4. Georgia assisted CSVs in the special meals for both sectors. When CSVs were on break, Georgia took charge in the cabin, made sure everything was prepared, we care done promptly and meals loaded.- 5. On the return sector, an elderly at 85K was feeling faint and dizzy, Georgia took care of her, gave oxygen, reassured her and even followed up after. She also informed Purser if we can take a wheelchair for her, assisted dur- 6. She was observed to have immaculate grooming, lipstick always replenished and smiles all the time towards her customers and colleagues

*** Exceptional Service ***- His Highness Dov Riger provided me with feedback regarding performance of CSA Maria Corinna.- His Highness stated "the kindness and warmth this girl provided is why I choose to fly with Emirates".- His Highness described Maria Corinna as very professional, courteous and approachable. - Customer stated "each time I approach her in the SPA area, she always asks how I am feeling ... what can we do to make your flight a wonderful one...when I am seated, she passes by and asks if I am comfortable.."- Listening to the customers feedback, I watched his manner and tone, and he was speaking from the heart as Maria Corinna sincerely made him feel special.

*** Exceptional Service ***- During the flight, I received feedback from His Highness Dov Riger seated in 2F about Cabin Service Assistant Maria Corinna. - His Highness described Maria Corinna as very professional, courteous and approachable crew member. - Customer stated "each time I approach her in the SPA area, she always asks how I am feeling ... what can we do to make your flight a wonderful one...when I am seated, she passes by and asks if I am comfortable.."- Listening to the customers feedback, I watched his manner and tone, and he was speaking from the heart as Maria Corinna sincerely made him feel special.

*** Exceptional performance****-CSV Ahmed Elshimy S199393 was observed completing several tasks which left a positive impact on his performance and customers satisfaction. -In the briefing, Ahmed arrived early, he introduced himself, and made the effort to welcome every single crew member to the room. -He showed interest in all the topics being discussed, he was also aware of all the service and product changes for Jan 2018. -On-board he lead his team by example and was observed in the cabin during the service assisting his team and following up with customers satisfaction. -During the service, one customer was shouting at a Chinese crew member in front of all the other customers.-He have professionally addressed the issue with the customer ensuring they were happy, and took the time to follow up with the crew motivating her and supporting her.-He was observed raising several reports as service recovery, customer feedback, and suggestions for enhancements.-During the flight he was punctual with his service timings and we care delivery.-He was professional, knowledgeable, and confident when dealing with a medical case during the flight. -He was able to speak with the Medical support team, follow up with the customer, communicate with his team, and kept me and the flight deck in the loop. -He raised all related medical reports along side with the correct paperwork.

*** Exceptional Performance ***- Exceptional performance observed throughout four sectors of CSV Adel Asem Ahmed Mohamed.- Adel has superior skills and outstanding professional capacity to lead a team to success. - With four sectors of challenging situations and adverse circumstances of a normal flight, Adel led his team exceptionally well, and was my great support and colleague. - Ranging from customer complaints to a sexual harassment case on board, Adel was poised, calm and clear in his actions and direction to his team. - He contributed a sense of stability to the team during these challenging situations by dealing with them in a charismatic, effective and correct way. - From his duties as a Cabin Supervisor, I observed him transform a lacking in efficiency and service standards team to a brilliantly performing crew.- His did this through crisp, direct and factual team talks that had a strong essence of motivation, support and drive.- I was in awe of Adel's performance; an incredible team member, exceptional supervisor and warm and kind person.

*** Exceptional performance ***- During the flight Reagan had an exceptionally positive attitude.- He greeted every one while entering the briefing room.- He offered advice to all the crew regarding the flight and the destination.- He showed great teamwork by coming to assist economy during a medical case situation.- He showed great leadership skills during the medical case, he took directly ownership of the situation.- He reassured the child and organised the crew around to get all the equipment required, to communicate with the Purser and flight crew and was very calm and reassuring while communicating with the child and his parents.- Reagan organised a common dinner for the layover which really helped to create a strong teamwork atmosphere.-  I believe Reagan showed great skills that could be really useful for the role of a cabin supervisor.

*** Exceptional performance *** - Nicola worked really well today.- She knew the flight was full both ways and therefore was very pro active.- She prepared as much as she could before hand and it was very helpful as everything was then very organised and ready for the service.- Because of her what could have been a stressful flight became easy.- Due to her pro activeness it encouraged the rest of the team to step up and follow her example.- We then also had more time to interact with customers.

*** Excellent work***- Although Monir was the most junior grade 2, he was a star performer on today's flight.- I would like to praise him for his team work and customer service skills.- First of all Monir has a contagious positive attitude which reflects on all his colleagues, he is always smiling and interacts really well with all cabin crew members.- Before boarding, Monir made sure he knew who the HVC were in his area of responsibility and used the KIS tablet to offer them other seating options to ensure their comfort. He checked on them many times during the flight.- He found out one customer had ordered a KSML by mistake and he organized a different meal for him, even offering his crew meal. - Monir helped me a lot with the galley without being prompted. He sorted out all the special meals with me and volunteered to be on the first "we care cycle" so his colleagues could eat first.- He took time to be personal with customers and chat with them and showed a lot of cabin presence. He was also helpful to all his colleagues at all stages of the flight asking if they needed help with anything.- It was a pleasure working with such a professional, motivated crew and I commend him for his good customer skills and his teamwork.

*** EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE ***- While interacting with Mrs Hlongwane (40B), Yamina found out that it was her birthday.- She took the initiative to organise a little surprise for her and her companion.- She melted chocolate and used it to wrote "happy birthday Thabile" on a plate to make the surprise more personal. - She decorated a tray with rose petals and flowers and plated some extra dessert from J/C.- She surprised them with the tray while singing the birthday song and took a picture of them.- Mrs Hlongwane was absolutely delighted and amazed by Yamina's gesture. She said that she never expected a surprise like this at 40,000ft and shared that she would never fly any other airline from now on. She shared pictures and comments on social media and kept thanking Yamina for organising it and making this flight so special.- From the beginning of the flight until the end, Yamina has been nothing but amazing with all the customers. She genuinely cares and is always looking for ways to make their flight exceptional. - She was running up and down in the cabin answering call bells, anticipating customers needs, helping families and genuinely interacting with them.

*** Excellent Performance ***- Throughout the trip EK 404, It has been observed by the cabin supervisors and the rest of the team, how caring and considerate Natasha is toward the passengers and her colleagues- She was observed taking care of kids during the trip and ensured that the customers were feeling comfortable throughout the flight and assisted them whenever assistance was required- As soon as there is a call bell, Natasha will ensure that it is answered promptly- She has sweet and friendly personality and is positive in everything she undertook- In the galley, she is always one step ahead and have equipment prepared and ready prior to the beginning of the service

*** Customer feedback on crew members` performance in JCL *** - Upon collecting feedbacks from the customers Ms Greenwood mentioned about all grade1 members` (428979 Emma Gallagher , 435354 Jessica Mather , 456592 Wojciech Iwaszkiewicz ) overall performance, they were highly attentive and she is very much satisfied with service.

*** Customer Feedback ***-Customer passed along her feedback and stated the following:" I flew with Qantas on the way over, and Emirates is much better compared to Qantas in terms of space even though it was the same aircraft type".-Ms Roase passed along her gratitude on the service she received from crew member Sophie (449463) I observed Sophie building a rapport with the customer, and offered extra CHML we had left over.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customers were welcomed at UL1 door and escorted to their suites. - Welcome Service was conducted as per standard. - Few customer requested for pyjamas and kit bags. - After take-off customers were offered Menus and Wine Lists.- I took the order for the customers and passed on the information to the FG1 crew. - All customer with the exception of Mr. Rishard (iO) had lunch. - Customer enjoyed a 6 course meal accompanied with wines on offer. - All wines requested were from First Class. - Customer gave very good feedback about the quality and efficiency of the service inflight. - Prior to landing, customer enjoyed Afternoon Tea. - As I bid farewell to the customers, all commented that they enjoyed the flight and the service was great.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customers were met at ML1 door and escorted to their suites by FG1 crew and myself. - We did not have an upper deck bridge, therefore we boarded all premium customers from ML1. - Customers were shown to their suites and assisted with their luggage. - Welcome service conducted as per standards. - Customer accepted all offerings of the service. - Menus and wine lists were given to customers and orders taken. - Customer ate throughout the flight. - Customer gave excellent meal appreciation for the menu items available on todays flight. - Customer also praised cc Mariann for her excellent service. - Prior to landing in Bangkok, customer were offered hot beverage.- Customer gave feedback that they enjoyed the flight very much.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customers were met and escorted to their suites. - Suite familiarization conducted.- Welcome service conducted as per standard, customers accepted all offerings of the service.- After take-off, customers were offered menus and wine lists. - Customers had dinner after take-off and asked for their beds to be made. - Customers slept most of the flight. - Prior to landing in Bangkok, customer had some options form the Light Bites menu and a selection of beverages. - Customers gave great feedback about the quality of the food and the exceptional service. - Customers were thanked for their loyalty and we bid them farewell upon disembarkation in Bangkok.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customers were met and escorted to their suites from L1 door by FG1 crew. - iO and his wife were escorted personally by me. - Suite familiarization was done and B777 First class facilities were introduced. - After take-off I offered the menus to the customer with the wine lists. - All customer ate after take-off. - Customer commented that the wine selection is "poor".- Offered alternatives from Business class, however customers declined. - Customers commented that food options were very tasty. - Gathered feedback regarding he flight from customers, they stated that the service was great.- Bid farewell in Male and thanked the customers for their business.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customers were met and escorted to their suites at L1 door. - All welcome service offerings were offered to the customers as per standard. - After take-off customers were offered menus and wine lists. - All customers had dinner accompanied with wines. - After the dinner service, customers closed their suites and slept until we started our descent to Dubai.- Customer feedback indicated that they enjoyed their inflight experience.

*** Customer Experience ***- Customer were met and escorted to their suites by FG1 crew and myself. - All welcome service offerings were offered and accepted by the customers. - Menus were distributed and orders taken. - All customers had dinner after take-off. - Customer commented that the food was very good. - After the dinner service, beds were made for the customers and they fell asleep. - Approxiemently 45 minutes prior to landing, customer bag to wake up.- Hot beverages were served to the customers. - Feedback received from customer at the end of the flight reflected that they have enjoyed their experience on board. - Bid farewell to the customers.

*** CREW FEEDBACK : PERFORMANCE ***- Crew Dmitrina was observed to be excellent in the cabin (outbound sector). She conducted boarding and settling in phases on ground professionally, interacted with the customers and ensured their comfort.- She worked in an organised manner during the service, prepared trays properly before proceeding in the cabin. Her experience in her grade made her confident in what she does and required less guidance and direction.- Her galley management skills were noted on the inbound sector.- She is structured, able to manage the small galley (2-class config) and still able to assist in the cabin.She took part of the We Care Schedule too which she used to interact with our customers.- Captain Dave Kilian also commented how well she took care of them by putting in effort and care when serving them.

*** Crew exceeding expectations ***- On TOD while I was checking on customer satisfaction, few of them complimented BiBi's performance, they were impressed with her positive approach, professionalism, and her willingness to help and make their flight exceptional.- As a personal observation, I noticed that Bibi is a very active and motivated crew member, she managed to communicate properly with the whole team members which created an enjoyable team spirit, Also she always took initiative to assist whenever it was needed without being prompted to.
*** Crew Compliments ***- Customer complimented the service received from crew members: CSV Salem Al Shaqsi s154921 and Amina Sirbegovic s434210.

*** Crew compliment performance ***- From AMS- DXB EK150 on 13-01-2018 I had the pleasure of flying with Shynade Austin 436246.- Shynade is a very hardworking and caring crew member. She assisted and guided her colleagues, sharing previous experiences.- During boarding Shynade welcomed all of her customers with a warm and guanine smile. She assisted elderly customers and parents traveling with young children. Once they settled in she followed up with them to check up on them if their was anything else she could assist them with. With this excellent soft skill she manage to tackle all IFE and seating problems in a very early stage of the flight.- Shynade took it upon herself to write down the names and seat numbers of the HV- Customers on the menu's, so that when the crew were delivering the meals they could address them by name.- She also looked up the staff traveling with us and welcomed them back, this way she found out that we had a couple of staff from other airlines travelling with us. Shynade understands that they have the option to fly with their own airline, but they choose to fly with us. She checked up on them throughout the flight and proudly represented Emirates as a true Brand ambassador.- Shynade was a excellent help in the galley and assisted me very well while I was taking care of the flight deck.- Maintained an immaculate grooming throughout the flight and also while walking though the airport.

*** CREW COMPLIMENT ***- Mrs. Qassad notified that due to the misunderstanding from the individual who assisted her to change the flight she thought she was going to be in FC.- Customer advised she was stressed out as she changed the flight last minute to see her daughter who just gave birth.- Crew Damien Scott (s435677) noticed Mrs. Qassad's confusion and distress, he assisted and patiently explained the situation. Due to his great customer service Mrs. Qassad purchased a duty free item for Damien and presented him with the gift as a token of her appreciation.

*** Considerate crew ***- Andreea observed during boarding that a mother with a infant was seated on 71C and no empty seats around;- Andreea approached the Cabin Supervisor and asked for support to assist the mother so she won't have to hold her baby for 12 hours;- 14 infants on the flight and no bassinet space;- Customer was very grateful and thanked Andreea;- Other customer around observed what Andreea did and praised her;- 82 A was blocked by ground staff as headphone were not working;

*** Compliments to J class team ***- A purser note which stated Mr.Alblehed was intoxicated, was pushing, cursing and did not comply with cabin crew instructions,  was raised from his previous flight and J class team informed;- During farewell, Mr.Alblehed, seated on 22G,  was keen on thanking me for the service on our flight;- Mr. Alblehed said that everyone on my team was friendly, helpful, caring,smiling and stated: "so much better then my previous flight crew"- Mrs. Anildivakaran, who was travelling with her 6years old and her 1 and a half year old daughters, stopped at UL1 during disembarkation and thanked us for helping her throughout the flight; Crew members were observed staying with the baby while the mother was escorting the older daughter to lavatory;- Mrs. Almaari, an emirati travelling with his wife on honeymoon to Los Angeles, also thanked us for looking after them throughout the flight; His wife had fever on our flight;- Several other customers complimented the service and the cabin crew during farewell;J class team: Khaled Khalifa 416350Jilan Yakoub 421625Crystal Thurston 429766Marion Faure 431205Gemma Khan 432395Angelo Margute 432723Karensa Lobo 438568Georgia Georgiou 439712

*** Compliment to crew***-Hui simply made a big difference to our flight-During first sector she volunteered to work in Economy class (due to configuration of the aircraft) and her professional image and help in the cabin made our life during the flight much easier since she spoke Mandarin and was all the time in the cabin anticipating customers needs-During return sector business class was very light so Hui came down to help us during both services and again was a great help in terms of communication with the customers and keeping a very positive atmosphere in the aircraft- she was really of great help to the team as well she was very attentive to our customers. She is very initiative, friendly, approachable and proactive!-Will be a great pleasure to fly with Hui again!

** Prolonged Delay in LHE **- We had a long ground delay in LHE due to a Tech issue that lasted for 03:28 hours.- Both cabins were almost full in J and Y class (35 / 382).- Customer were not sure about the delay due to no confirmed timing given to them as the captain was communicating what he get from the Engineers.- Some customers saw the maintenance work from the RHS windows at the wing and started to become Excited.- Two hours into the delay without food nor allowing the customers to go out of the aircraft into the waiting area customers started to become aggressive towards the crew and some were reported being physical.- Crew kept their presence in the cabin and were showing solid attitude keeping a grip.- Customers started pushing the crew so hard till they made their way to L2 door (about 25 of them) and were loud asking to be allowed outside the aircraft and to have some sort of food as they were waiting for almost 03 hours.- Most customers calmed down after the hot meal service was offered and done in all cabins- Despite how tired  the crew became due to the long duty hours, they all managed to pull out a very efficient and fast Hot meal service right after take off.- No customer offloaded  them selves thanks to the crew continuous support and follow up during those 3:28 hours
** Presentation feedback **-Hot meals on this flight where very poorly presented, items seemed to be placed carelessly on the casseroles.

** Phu Quoc Pham (Nathan) s430985 - excellent performance**Nathan was praised for his excellent performance throughout the four sectors as per below observations :* Professionalism - Nathan displayed constantly a professional posture, he interacted with his colleagues and customers in a polite and kind manner. He assisted the bus driver to unload the suitcases in SYD  and BKK airport. His galley management was spot on, all preparations ready on time, galley organized and kept clean at all times. * Teamwork - Nathan is a strong team player, he offered to swap YC during breaks, he assisted YC team during last meal service by doing a meal cart and delivering special meals. He ensured his senior was informed and returned to JC for the beginning of the service. Despite being the galley operator, he was observed delivering drinks in the cabin assisting his colleague while I was occupied with customer. He also offered to take over the lounge.On BKK-DXB, during team talk he asked if his colleagues would like to have the crew meal heated after take-off. *Knowledge - In all sectors he participated actively in briefing, answering Aircraft type specific questions.  It was a pleasure having such hardworking and dedicated crew member.

** OUTSTANDING PERFORMANCE**- Jae had been pulled out on this flight and showed an outstanding performance.- Jae was proactive and hard working.- On a challenging sector, manage to created a positive atmosphere among crew.- Jae is proactive and organised in the galley. Jae did not need to be prompt and constantly offers his help to others.- Jae is always on a tasks at any point of the flight. - Jae kept the communication open about heavy drinkers in the cabin and monitored the drinks and behaviour.- Jae shows great passion in what he does and leads by example.

** Outstanding performance:- From the briefing, Andrea was noticed to be very approachable and nice to all colleagues.- As I needed to be at the door for boarding, Andrea took the initiative and did a thorough catering checks, and promptly kept me informed with all details.- Took ownership of all situations arose during the service, solved them on the spot, and communicated them to myself.- Was aware of gold members in her area, greeted them back- using their names- and looked after them throughout the flight.- One of Andrea's best traits that she can anticipate problems before happening; for example, as we were running out of one meal choice, Andrea immediately took the meal order for the gold member in her area and made sure he got his choice.- Was also observed using full menu terminology during the service, "not just chicken or lamb".- One of her passengers was a crew member of Lufthansa. Andrea had the time to look after her as well; and used the polaroid camera to make her experience memorable.- After we finished the service in YC, she promptly went to JC and offered help, as they were still doing the service.- Last but not least, Andrea offered her own medication to another colleague when noticed is not feeling well.- Andrea is such a great example of an active, hardworking, nice and approachable crew member, and it was such a pleasure flying with herself.

** Outstanding performance of CC Rayed Al Sughayer on Today's Flight**Raed had excellent work ethics, he was observed to have initiative in the galley, prepared carts before hand and assisted me with the special meals, as well as loading the carts.Raed asked me to teach him how to operate the printer to print the special meal stickers as he would like to help his Cabin supervisors to save time on his future flights.As soon as the service in economy was finished, Raed volunteered to help in business class on both sectors. He was very keen to learn the service in business class and was  observed building rapport with the business class customers. As there was a crew celebrating her birthday, Raed arranged a small cake from the hotel personnel and the cake was presented to the crew when all the crew have checked out. This made the atmosphere of the flight fun and positive. He also bought all the crew a small present for the celebration of New Year. All the crew had a smile on their face which reflected in the flight as well. After the light bites service, a customer complained to one of the CC that they were not served a sandwich, when Raed saw this, he approached the customers and spoke to them in Filipino and performed service recovery by promptly preparing cup noodles and drinks for the customers which made the customers calm down and thanked Raed for serving them.

** Outstanding performance **- Ivana showed very good quality on our flight.- Always smiling in the cabin, helping her colleagues and customers on both sectors.- Went around the cabin doing camera and playing with the kids to make sure there parents rest assured that the crew are available to help them.- During the LHR-DXB flight Ivana showed the same qualities again, didn't hesitate to delegate the service and the galley to her which she did very efficiently, prepared all the carts for her colleagues and also went out to the cabin to do the bar so we can finish the service on time.

** Outstanding Performance **- Inhyeong demonstrated great passion for her role as cabin crew- She was observed interacting with customers at every opportunity - Spoke enthusiastically about Emirates Skywards program and managed to enrol two customers she had built a relationship with - She took the initiative in assisting me in the galley with loading meal carts and cleaning any items left behind- She was observed closing bars and containers in preparation for landing and reminding her colleagues to do the same- Observed smiling throughout the whole flight and displaying great energy- Overall Inhyeong was a pleasure to work with and I would like to wish her the very best on her career

** Outstanding Crew Performance **- Crew member Suhhyun was very enthusiastic and motivated throughout the flight.- Suhhyun actively participated in the briefing and encouraged the rest of the team to do the same.- Suhhyun was supporting and assisting to her colleagues were needed.- Suhhyun spotted a couple who were travelling with their family for their 60th wedding anniversary. She informed her colleagues and together with them made a small surprise for the couple. She managed to spare 2 cakes from J class after the meal service and served Ginger Ale in champagne flutes for them so they could feel special on board. She also took photos of the couple and asked her colleagues to congratulate them in various languages. The couple and their family were delighted with Suhhyun's attention.- Suhhyun was also observed looking after a customer who was afraid of flying and turbulence. She reassured her and took her around the cabin to meet rest of the crew. She monitored her throughout the flight and ensured her comfort.-Suhhyun informed me of all cabin defects and followed up with customers' requests. - Suhhyun was a role model to all her colleagues on the flight and it was a real pleasure working with her.

** Insufficient lamb**-Lamb on this flight was insufficient by 15-20 pieces.

** Incorrect meals loaded **- Approximately 30% of the meals loaded for breakfast service were Chicken Tights With Chilli Sauce instead of only Mushroom ragout omelette (60%) and Scrambled eggs (40%)- It was packed in the same yellow aluminium foil as Mushroom ragout omelette.- During the catering checks Catering staff never informed us about this 3rd choice that was not even mentioned in the menu.

** Incorrect child meal casseroles **- During the first meal service, I realised after most of the CHML trays were delivered that some of the casseroles consisted of an omelette which was supposed to be for the second meal service which was breakfast.- While loading the casseroles for the second meal service, I found that out of 33CHML casseroles 20 casseroles were for dinner and 13 were for breakfast.

** Inconsistent CHML **-It was observed that CHML special meals where not consistent with each other, some child meals came with breaded chicken mash potatoes and peas and others with unbreaded chicken and pasta.-Presentation for both was very bad.

** Inconsistency in both meal temperature after heating ** - During breakfast it was found that the Prawn Congee was still cold after 30min. in the oven while the other optioning Scrambled eggs were really hot.
** Ice cream *** Customer is a regular traveller to European destinations and requested for ice cream today.* He said Emirates should always have ice cream available.

** Honeymoon Celebration **- Mr Podobnik was traveling with his wife Ms Knight sitting at 72K.- During my conversation with the couple they informed me that they were going on their honeymoon.- Customer was very happy and thank us for an excellent service.
** HNML  COMPLAINT **- Mr. Bhargava stated that the HNML wasn't appealing, he said "its looks like diabetic meal".- He requested for a normal meal tray instead.

** High Performer**-Anne Laure is such a great role model to all her colleagues, a wonderful Emirates Ambassador who loves her job so much-From briefing to landing, Anne Laure was observed smiling and chatting with her colleagues and all her customers in her section-She knew all her customers by name and was observed having conversations with them-Customers loved her so much, she was taking pictures of children and they were so happy to received their polaroid pictures that they hugged and kissed her-Parents were very happy with Anne Laure's performance-On CDG-DXB, a HVC Ms Pan seated in 6K was not happy with the configuration of the A380 2 Class that she was heard sharing her disappointment in a loud voice in the cabin, Anne Laure took ownership and went to reassure customer by telling her that even if she did not like the aircraft she will still have an amazing on board experience -Ms Tan was more than impressed with her flight that she claimed that she was treated like a queen-Also Anne Laure found out that one of her customer was having a birthday so when she offered him the menu, she wrote on it in French Happy Birthday which made his day-Anne Laure is such a wonderful crew member and it was my pleasure flying with her on this flight-Wishing her all the best for her career progression

** GFML bread inconsistent **-GFMLs on todays flight did not all have the same bread, some had a bun style bread and others a muffin shaped one.
** Garlic bread **-We ran out of garlic bread during the first half of the first bread basket rotation.

** Fresh Fruits for continental breakfast **- Many of our customers were disappointed as we didn't have the fresh fruits for the continental breakfast- Customers didn't read the menu and they were expecting fruits to be served on the trays.
** FOR ALL ONGOING FLIGHTS PLEASE ENSURE VEG CHML IS CATERED **- Please ensure for future flights a VEG CHML is ordered.

** FOOD QUALITY AND QUANTITY .* Majority of the customers  preferred the LAMB PIE from the menu .* The loading was as follow : Lamb pie 11,  CHX dish 8, Salad 7 and Pasta 11.* Pasta was the least popular meal option as most of the customers opted for Lamb Pie which was considered substantial compared to others.* Customers complained about the quality taste of Nicoise salad and Pasta ( risotto) . ( No detailed feed back given however the meal was returned )* According to Business Class crew member who often do this flight, the meal option and quantity has always been a challenge on this sector and nothing much has been done to improve the ratio and change of light bite options .

** Food choice not compatible with customer choice **Choice of Meals in Lunch menu:Lamb sausage 40%Chicken 60%-90% of customers asked for the chicken hot meal.-Few customers gave me feedback about the lamb sausage as weird choice of menu.

** Fell short of 3 lamb stew meals **- During the lunch service, Mrs Sindi requested for a lamb stew but we were unable to meet with her request.- 2 other customers at the aft of economy also requested for lamb stews whose request we could not meet with.

** FEEDBACK FROM CUSTOMER**-Julien received feedback from a customer seated at 44G Mrs Pinabentoberner.-Mrs Pinabentoberner said that Julien had a great smile, she appreciated that he took the time to have a chat with her and her husband outside of service time, assisted her with the IFE and that all of this realy made her flight.-Julien offered to do the catering check for me from DPS of which he did a thorough job of. He clearly communicated which carts were for which service and the percentage of meals for each service.

** extra special meal in Y/C **- Y/C were loaded with extra SPML, there was no information highlighted in the system/ PIL to identify who are the SPML for , later on we found the customer requested the SPML in J/C .

** EXCHANGE VGML FOR AVML **- During the 1st service customer requested to change her strict vegetarian meal (VGML) for an AVML.- Customer was happy to have his preferred meal choice and the profile updated for future flights.

** Exceptional behaviour on board **-Today Sarah wowed her customers and colleagues with what she did for a little girl on the flight.-During boarding she noticed a little girl that had a special bond with her doll, after some conversation with said girl she offered to upgrade the doll to first class, the girl was very happy and excited and gave Sarah her doll for the upgrade.-During the flight, working around the flight deck crew rest in the suites she managed to take the doll  to the first class suite, take pictures of the doll watching movies, eating, sleeping, chatting with the crew, receiving the first class service, in the flight deck with the controls and many more well thought out scenes, not only this but she assembled and hand sewed an album out of the picture frames, used stickers from child meals to decorate the album and at the end of the flight, when the doll returned from its first class experience she presented this to the little girl, much to her and her parents delight  as well as other customers who where visibly impressed.-All of this was done without compromising her duties with we care schedules, she ensured her colleagues where completing their tasks while i was away and  ensured the team was performing to the expected level.

** Excellent team player **-After having a situation in Y class were a lady vomit all over ML1 area and cockpit stairs and a big mess was left all over.-I called Janine to ask her if she had any extra cleaning products that we could use or perhaps some wipes.-Without hesitation Janine came and helped us with the unpleasant situation which we wanted to clean as soon a possible as it was in the middle of the service and all around other customers. -Without Janine help we would have took much longer.-Got feedback also from F class crew regarding Janines great job.

** EXCELLENT SERVICE **- Mr Hooper was overjoyed by the crew today saying they were excellent, very helpful and friendly. He wrote a letter to the crew on board -"I would just like to commend your staff on to days flight. Their efforts to make you comfortable was just too great. I have always said Emirates are the best, and the staff have proved it once again. Thank you very muchPeter Hooper

** EXCELLENT PREFORMANCE **- It was one of our customers birthdays in business class, Lokesh told the crew that he always carries some birthday decorations in his bag. He put it up in the lounge and decorated a cake (dessert) spelling out the customers name in chocolate and decorating the tray with flowers.- We took photos and sang happy birthday to the customer- The customer was very happy and told us it had made his flight - The business class crew informed me he had also done the same thing on the previous sector

** EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE**- During briefing in DXB, Faiza volunteered to work as FG1 in FC.- It was observed that during the FC service she was utilizing every possible opportunity to learn more about FC service and products, through her Purser and fellow FG1.- On the sector JNB-DXB, Faiza also volunteered to work and help her colleagues in JC, as JC cabin was full. As one of the GR2's was operating as GR1 and she was not familiar and confident with JC service, Faiza ensured to guide her through the steps of the service and she was giving her tips on how to be efficient with JC service. - She acted as a mentor for her GR2 colleague and her colleague was very grateful for everything that Faiza demonstrated to her during the flight.- Faiza displayed a positive attitude during the whole duration of the flight and she proved herself as a very hardworking crew.- Her performance was also appreciated by the Purser and the whole team in JC and her hard-work proved to be essential in achieving a successful flight.

** Excellent Performance. **While I worked two sectors with Kamal, I observed the following facts.* Kamal is true asset of the Company. He is very friendly and proactive crew member. * Kamal never hesitate to help colleagues and customers at all times.* On ground in Dubai, Kamal started preparing things for pre departure duties including coffee/tea jug and milk jiggers for the lunch service in advance. It helped a lot to do the service without any delay.* Kamal is actively working in the galley and cabin without even needed to remind and prompt him.* Kamal helped to load hot meals for lunch service while I was busy with the special meal distribution.* Kamal prepared things in advance.* As soon as lunch service finished, Kamal closed most of the bar carts while the other crew were on meal break.* Kamal helped and assisted the customers during boarding and answered customers' call bell without any hesitation during the flight.* We Care cycle was done properly.* Kamal helped and assisted wheelchair customer with her hand carry and customer was really appreciated for that.* Customers were happy and satisfied with the service that he provided.* Kamal is genuinely very nice and positive crew member and he worked well with the team.

** EXCELLENT PERFORMANCE ON BOTH SECTORS **- DXB-BKK we had a medical incident and the customer spoke English but her preferred language which german, Alisha helped me significantly whilst dealing with the customers and also you could see it had a positive impact on the customer that she instantly started to relax.- Alisha stayed with the customer until she fully recovered.- BKK-DXB Alisha was extremely thorough with securing she noticed a customer had a car seat and asked me for confirmation if it was allowed rather than just assuming it was ok.-Observed on both sectors to being very hard working, participates in all required jobs, is a great team member and supports them throughout by asking if she can assist when there answering call bells or making drinks.- Alisha is very positive with a constant smile.- Its been an absolute pleasure working with her.

** Excellent performance and teamwork **- Oleksandra went to assist her colleagues with the service  in Business Class since all customers in FC were sleeping.- She was constantly offering to assist wherever needed.- Oleksandra is always smiling, happy and positive, which makes it a pleasure to work with her.- All customers in FC complimented her and had good comments about her service and personality.

** Excellent performance and teamwork **- Munkyung went to assist her colleagues with the service  in Business Class since all customers in FC were sleeping.- She was constantly offering to assist wherever needed.- Munkyung is always smiling, happy and positive, which makes it a pleasure to work with her.- All customers in FC complimented her and had good comments about her service and personality.
